    Symphony looked down.

   "Um, I'll try," he said, reply to Motormaster=
 telling him to act like a Decepticon.

   "Hrr!  Me Decepticon!  Me your g=
reat nightmare!" Symphony said.

  Fro=

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday,=
 April 27, 2001 11:40 AM
  Subject: Re: Bad Metal


  Motormaster transform=
ed and shifted into his robot mode. He then 
  looked down at Symphony. "Yo=
u want to be a Decepticon? Then act like 
  one" he spat harshly. He grabbe=
d him by the arm and easily hoisted him 
  up, and began to fly towards the=
 next continent, trying to catch up to 
  the others.

ups Sponsor
